DOC.brief_summary: Examine whether daily oral ingestion of a immunomodulatory mushroom extract (AndoSanTM) in patients with ulcerative colitis (UC) and Crohn`s disease (CD), experience clinical, biochemical and genetical improvement in their disease. A prospective randomised study comparing the mushroom extract with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Anti-inflammatory Effect of Agaricus Blazei Murill in Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)
DOC.criteria: moderate disease serious disease, biological treatment, pregnancy.
